description: This object indicates the alarm reported when the number of Telnet users reaches
the maximum number of Telnet connections. In addition, the maximum number of
Telnet connections is displayed.

event.Summary: Maximum number of telnet users reached

description: The value of this object identifies the maximum number of Telnet connections.
The value ranges from 0 to 15. The default value is 5.
variables.name: HUAWEI-LINE-MIB::hwMaxVtyNumber

description: When a user logs in through Telnet/Stelnet, the user name, IP address for login,
used tunnel, authentication type and vpn name are reported.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-LINE-MIB::hwUserLogin HUAWEI-LINE-MIB::hwUserInfoName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-LINE-MIB::hwUserInfoIpAddr s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-LINE-MIB::hwUserInfoChannel s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-LINE-MIB::hwAuthType s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-LINE-MIB::hwVpnInstName s EXAMPLE

description: This object indicates the name of the user for login.
variables.name: HUAWEI-LINE-MIB::hwUserInfoName

description: This object indicates the IP address of the user for login.
variables.name: HUAWEI-LINE-MIB::hwUserInfoIpAddr

description: This object indicates the channel number of the user for login.
variables.name: HUAWEI-LINE-MIB::hwUserInfoChannel

description: This object indicates the authentication method for login.
variables.name: HUAWEI-LINE-MIB::hwAuthType

description: This object indicates the VPN name of the user for login.
variables.name: HUAWEI-LINE-MIB::hwVpnInstName

description: When a user fails to log in through Telnet/Stelnet, the user name, IP address for login,
used tunnel, authentication type and vpn name are reported.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-LINE-MIB::hwUserLoginFail HUAWEI-LINE-MIB::hwUserInfoName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-LINE-MIB::hwUserInfoIpAddr s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-LINE-MIB::hwUserInfoChannel s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-LINE-MIB::hwAuthType s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-LINE-MIB::hwVpnInstName s EXAMPLE

description: This object indicates the VPN name of the user for login.
variables.name: HUAWEI-LINE-MIB::hwVpnInstName

description: When a user logs out of the Telnet/Stelnet server, the user name, IP address for logout,
used tunnel, authentication type and vpn name are reported.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-LINE-MIB::hwUserLogout HUAWEI-LINE-MIB::hwUserInfoName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-LINE-MIB::hwUserInfoIpAddr s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-LINE-MIB::hwUserInfoChannel s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-LINE-MIB::hwAuthType s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-LINE-MIB::hwVpnInstName s EXAMPLE

description: When a user logs in to SSH server, the user name, IP address for login,
used tunnel, authentication type and vpn name are reported.

description: When users failed to login telnet server too frequently, login fail times and statistics period are reported.
Login failed times in the statistic period
variables.name: HUAWEI-LINE-MIB::hwUserInfoLoginFailedTimes

description: Statistic period to count login failed times
variables.name: HUAWEI-LINE-MIB::hwUserInfoStatisticPeriod

description: When users failed to login ssh server too frequently, login fail times and statistics period are reported.

event.Summary: User failed to login SSH server

description: Login failed times in the statistic period
variables.name: HUAWEI-LINE-MIB::hwUserInfoLoginFailedTimes

description: Statistic period to count login failed times
variables.name: HUAWEI-LINE-MIB::hwUserInfoStatisticPeriod

description: when the number of user login failures from the same IP address reaches the threshold, the trap of hwIpLocked is reported.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-LINE-MIB::hwIpLocked HUAWEI-LINE-MIB::hwUserInfoIpAddress s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-LINE-MIB::hwUserInfoVpnName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-LINE-MIB::hwUserInfoStatisticPeriod i 9999

variables.name: HUAWEI-LINE-MIB::hwUserInfoStatisticPeriod

description: When the IP is unlocked, the trap of hwIpUnLocked is reported.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-LINE-MIB::hwIpUnLocked HUAWEI-LINE-MIB::hwUserInfoIpAddress s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-LINE-MIB::hwUserInfoVpnName s EXAMPLE
